entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 1:48 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low.
